name: deleteSalesTax
description: This call deletes a sales tax table entry for a jurisdiction. Specify the jurisdiction to delete using the countryCode and jurisdictionId path parameters.

countryCode.description: This path parameter specifies the two-letter ISO 3166 code for the country whose sales tax table entry you want to delete.

jurisdictionId.description: This path parameter specifies the ID of the sales tax jurisdiction whose table entry you want to delete. Retrieve valid jurisdiction IDs using getSalesTaxJurisdictions in the Metadata API.
